overview:
We are neither a company nor an agency in a strict business sense, but rather group of native Arab post graduates with more than 10 years of translation experience. Each one of us is a member of one or more of a recognized professional organization, and therefore, we act according to the code of conduct of these professional organizations, and therefore we act according to the code of conduct of these professional organizations.

We incorporate our academic and practical experience with our linguistic skills to produce the most reliable translations available for all types of industries and businesses.

Our scientific and linguistic background as well as our experience in simultaneous translation is likely to make us the professional group in the translation business in the UAE and the region. It is imperative to note that translation is a Fine Art, and not everyone who speaks English and Arabic is a trained translator.
